name: Tahoe Dragon: The Beginning
description:
THEY WARNED US IN THE 1980S, "YOU DON'T WANT TO KNOW WHAT IS DOWN AT THE BOTTOM OF LAKE TAHOE." THE YEAR IS 2042. AN EARTHQUAKE BENEATH THE LAKE REMOVED ROCKS FROM UNDERWATER TUNNELS THAT SET THE BEAST FREE. THE TOURIST COMMUNITY WILL BECOME A FEEDING GROUND FROM THE CREATURE OF THE DEEP. PREPARE TO EVACUATE.

Features:

Dynamic Combat: You are the beast set free from under water caves beneath Lake Tahoe. You seek and destroy anything in your path. Creatures under the lake and humans on land.

TONS of Content: North, East, South, West. All over the land. You will discover surprises and extra points. You will be immersed in a real fantasy tale of unique characters and creatures.

Customization Options Galore: Several different color dragons to choose from. Many different ways to scare your victims. From swiping, stomping, spitting lava or water, and more! The options are endless.

Stunning Visuals: Beautiful high resolution graphics in UE4! 4.27/5.0
